title: The Silent Broadcast
story_summary: Halden's recorded confession plays on every device, shaking the city. People rebel together and swap their BCI profiles. Ghosts uncover hidden Council crimes. When the system falters, protests erupt. The Council can no longer hide; Stenograd faces real change for the first time.

official.headline: Citywide Broadcast Stuns
official.anchor_line: A surprise message from the late Marek Halden was aired across all city networks this morning.
official.contextual_reframing: Council assures the public that robust review protocols will address system communication anomalies efficiently.

official.headline: Citizen Gatherings Grow
official.anchor_line: Groups assembled in key districts following today's historic broadcast announcement.
official.contextual_reframing: Orderly civic engagement demonstrates the culture of resilience and unity promoted by Stenograd's ongoing reforms.

official.headline: Systemic Reform Debated
official.anchor_line: Council initiates open discussion on future improvements as BCI routines face unprecedented challenges.
official.contextual_reframing: This adaptive response highlights Stenograd's commitment to evolving governance and transparent progress.

underground.headline: Halden Speaks From The Grave
underground.anchor_line: Halden's confessional message hit every device in Stenograd  -  uncensored, unforgettable.
underground.contextual_reframing: The voice that built the system is back. The Council's secrets are no longer safe. Listen. Remember.

underground.headline: BCI Sabotaged Live
underground.anchor_line: Citizens block checkpoints, swap IDs, and break scoring routines  -  the numbers don't control the streets tonight.
underground.contextual_reframing: People aren't waiting for permission. When the system glitches, you choose who you are  -  not your assigned score.

underground.headline: Council Forced Into The Light
underground.anchor_line: Cracks everywhere. Secrets out. Council is debating in public for the first time, with the city watching and unrest spreading.
underground.contextual_reframing: Systemic reform or systemic collapse? The spell is broken. This is only the beginning.
